arts.ttl: Simeone discusses coaching his son and more in Atlético - Villarreal presser
arts.sum: Atlético Madrid coach Diego Simeone spoke following Saturday’s 1-1 draw with Villarreal in La Liga, as the Colchoneros failed to complete a comeback after going behind to the Yellow Submarine at the Metropolitano. On the call, Simeone reflected, “what the players told me is that the referee said that first the man touches the ball and then the ball.

arts.ttl: Atletico Madrid stumbles in La Liga again after draw with Villarreal
arts.sum: We are happy,” Gerard said for a Villarreal that stayed in fifth place. The stalemate, which came a week after a shock 1-0 loss at Leganes, left Atletico one point behind Real Madrid before the leader visited last-placed Valladolid.

arts.ttl: Atletico Madrid register interest in six-goal La Liga striker
arts.sum: Atletico Madrid could be on the lookout for a new striker in the summer, with Antoine Griezmann possibly leaving for the MLS. In preparation for this, a shortlist looks to have been drawn up by the club’s sporting department, and names are now starting to emerge. Not only Griezmann, Angel Correa could also be on […] The post Atletico Madrid register interest in six-goal La Liga striker appeared first on Football España.

arts.ttl: Villarreal aiming for club-record sale with Atletico Madrid target Alex Baena
arts.sum: Alex Baena has been the standout performer for Villarreal over the last 18 months, as well as one of La Liga’s best players in the same period. However, the double-edged sword in this scenario is that his level of performances has meant that a number of clubs have taken an interest in signing him. Baena […] The post Villarreal aiming for club-record sale with Atletico Madrid target Alex Baena appeared first on Football España.

arts.ttl: Atletico Madrid target Arsenal left back Oleksandr Zinchenko but face competition from German giants
arts.sum: SIMON JONES: Zinchenko joined the Gunners in 2022 from Man City , and was a major boost to Mikel Arteta 's plans at the time, but has found himself falling down the packing order.

Atletico Madrid have dropped down to second place in La Liga after losing to Leganes last time out. Villarreal are pushing for the Champions League spots, but they currently trail Athletic Club by s...

arts.ttl: Key star passed fit for Atletico Madrid’s La Liga return
arts.sum: Atletico Madrid will be aiming to ramp up the La Liga title pressure on Real Madrid this weekend. With the title race tightly poised after 20 games played for both sides, Los Rojiblancos are currently trailing the leaders by two points. The title picture could change in the next 48 hours, with Atletico Madrid hosting […] The post Key star passed fit for Atletico Madrid’s La Liga return appeared first on Football España.

arts.ttl: 'Serious talks': Sky Sports journalist says Atletico Madrid now want to sign £30m Arsenal star in shock move

arts.sum: Confirming our report, Antoine Griezmann has officially signed with Decathlon, ending his 14-year partnership with Puma.

arts.ttl: Diego Simeone explains the difference in his approach between La Liga and the Champions League
arts.sum: Atlético Madrid coach Diego Simeone spoke to the press ahead of Saturday’s La Liga game against Villarreal after a hectic week of drama in the Champions League, and addressed a range of topics from individual player form through to transfer speculation. One question came from Cadena Cope, with Simeone challenged on why he spoke about reaching the final of the Champions League, while in the league it’s the ‘partido a partido’ approach of going by game.
